import logo from '../img/logo.svg' import home from '../img/home.svg' import catalogicon from '../img/shopping-cart.svg' import cart from '../img/shopping-bag.svg' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useState } from 'react'; import useScrollPosition from '../hooks/useScrollPosition'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; function Navigation() { const [sticky, setSticky] = useState(false) useScrollPosition( ({ prevPos, currPos }) => { const isShow = currPos.y > prevPos.y if (isShow !== sticky) setSticky(isShow) }, [sticky] ) useEffect(() => { if (window.scrollY === 0) { setSticky(true) } }, [sticky]) return ( <>

  • Home

  • Catalog
) } export default Navigation;
